title: This Week's Top Stories - Spring Break Chaos in Miami Beach, NCAA Gender Disparities & Dog Bow Ties
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Spring Break Chaos in Miami Beach, NCAA Gender Disparities & Dog Bow Ties
description:
Maskless spring break revelers cause a state of emergency in Miami Beach, FL, casual sexism pervades the women's NCAA tournament, and a teenager uses bow ties to boost dog adoptions.
